GenAiFunction.description:
Manage metadata using SOAP-based Metadata API wrapper.
USAGE GUIDELINES: SOAP Actions: - describeMetadata: Get metadata structure, no parameters needed - listMetadata: Takes typeName, returns metadata of that type - readMetadata: Requires typeName and fullName - createMetadata: Requires typeName and attributesJson - updateMetadata: Requires typeName and attributesJson, updates existing - upsertMetadata: Creates or updates based on existence - deleteMetadata: Requires typeName and fullName
Technical Details: - JSON attributes must match metadata type structure - Supports all deployable metadata types - Handles up to 10 items per operation - Automatic rollback on partial failures - XML-based deployment behind the scenes - Responses are raw SOAP XML responses - API version matches org's version - Namespace aware operations - Case-sensitive metadata names
